title: Morning News Call - Canada, September 6
text:
© Reuters. Morning News Call - Canada, September 6

To access a PDF version of this newsletter, please click here http://share.thomsonreuters.com/assets/newsletters/Morning_News_Call/MNCGeneric_CA_09062019.pdf

You can read Morning News Call Canada via TOPNEWS Canada page.

If you would like to receive this newsletter through your email, please register at:

http://solutions.refinitiv.com/MorningNewsCallENsubscriptionpage

ECONOMIC EVENTS

0830 (approx.) Average hourly wages permanent employee yy for Aug: Prior 4.54%

0830 Employment change for Aug: Expected 15,000; Prior -24,200

0830 Unemployment rate for Aug: Expected 5.7%; Prior 5.7%

0830 Full time employment change SA for Aug: Prior -11,600

0830 Part time employment change SA for Aug: Prior -12,600

0830 Participation rate for Aug: Prior 65.6%

1000 Ivey PMI for Aug: Prior 51.2

1000 Ivey PMI SA for Aug: Expected 53.0; Prior 54.2

COMPANIES REPORTING RESULTS

September 6:

No major companies are scheduled to report.

September 9:

Major Drilling Group International Inc (MDI). Expected Q1 earnings of 56 Canadian cents per share

CORPORATE EVENTS

No major events are scheduled for the day.

EX-DIVIDENDS

Abitibi Royalties Inc (RZZ). Amount C$0.03

Canadian National Railway Co (CNR). Amount C$0.53

Power Corporation of Canada (POW). Amount C$0.40

Rogers Communications Inc (RCIa). Amount C$0.50

Torstar Corp (TSb). Amount C$0.02

For Morning News Call U.S. -- a preview of market-moving news for the trading day:

- type US/MNC in a news browser if you are an Eikon user, or type RT/US/MNC in a news browser if you are a Thomson One user

For The Day Ahead -- a recap of the day's events and preview of the next trading day:

- type DAY/US in a news browser if you are an Eikon user or type RT/DAY/US in a news browser if you are a Thomson One user
